text: "Rock and Roll, Hoochie Koo" is a 1970 song by Johnny Winter and was taken from his studio album Johnny Winter And. It was written by Rick Derringer and was made into a single in 1973 where it peaked at number 23 in the United States and number 11 in Canada. ==References== Category:1970 songs Category:Johnny Winter songs Category:Suzi Quatro songs
title: Rock and Roll, Hoochie Koo
